products.name: Men's Dri-FIT Training T-Shirt
products.description: Lightweight and breathable training t-shirt with moisture-wicking technology.
products.longDescription: This premium training t-shirt features advanced moisture-wicking technology to keep you dry during intense workouts. The lightweight fabric allows for maximum mobility while the breathable design ensures comfort throughout your training session. Perfect for gym sessions, running, or casual wear.

products.name: Women's Performance Leggings
products.description: High-waisted compression leggings with four-way stretch fabric.

products.name: Men's Running Shorts
products.description: Lightweight running shorts with built-in liner and side pockets.

products.name: Women's Sports Bra
products.description: Medium-support sports bra with racerback design for maximum mobility.

products.name: Unisex Compression Arm Sleeves
products.description: Compression arm sleeves to improve blood circulation and muscle recovery.

products.name: Men's Running Shoes
products.description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper.
products.longDescription: Experience superior comfort and performance with these premium running shoes. The responsive cushioning absorbs impact while providing energy return with each stride. The breathable mesh upper keeps your feet cool, and the durable rubber outsole offers excellent traction on various surfaces. Ideal for daily runs, training sessions, or marathon preparation.

products.name: Women's Cross-Training Shoes
products.description: Versatile training shoes with stable base and flexible forefoot for multi-directional movements.

products.name: Basketball High-Tops
products.description: High-top basketball shoes with ankle support and cushioned midsole for explosive movements.

products.name: Tennis Court Shoes
products.description: Durable tennis shoes with non-marking outsole and lateral support for quick side-to-side movements.

products.name: Trail Running Shoes
products.description: Rugged trail running shoes with aggressive tread pattern and rock plate for protection on rough terrain.

products.name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set
products.description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells with weight range from 2.5kg to 25kg per dumbbell.
products.longDescription: Transform your home gym with this versatile adjustable dumbbell set. Each dumbbell can be quickly adjusted from 2.5kg to 25kg with a simple dial mechanism, replacing 15 pairs of traditional dumbbells. The compact design saves valuable space while providing a complete range of weight options for various exercises. The durable construction ensures long-lasting performance for years of workouts.

products.name: Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat with alignment lines and eco-friendly TPE material.

products.name: Resistance Bands Set
products.description: Set of 5 resistance bands with different resistance levels for versatile workouts.

products.name: Basketball - Official Size
products.description: Official size and weight basketball with premium composite leather cover.

products.name: Tennis Racket
products.description: Intermediate-level tennis racket with balanced power and control.
